title: Saint jon
author: Saint jon
content: Crypto Fund Trader offers a unique proposition for traders like me, allowing the trade of crypto, forex. The two-phase evaluation process, upon successful completion, grants funding up to $200,000, with an 80% profit share. Their user-friendly platform, CFT Platform, supports various trading styles, offering high leverage, low fees, and spreads from 0 pips. The absence of day limits and trading restrictions adds flexibility. Integration with MetaTrader5 enhances accessibility to over 100 crypto pairs. The payout system, with an 80:20 profit split, ensures straightforward withdrawals via bank transfer or cryptocurrencies. Crypto Fund Trader stands out as a transparent and empowering avenue for traders to explore and succeed.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Can't you just get it?We are tired of you shilling your "prop firm" here and there using your alternate accounts. it's probably scam (Cryptofundtrader.com)I mean just look at your post history - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;threads;u=3550769;sa=showPostsAnd then you alternate accounts1. ameliabrw ---> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5470934.msg63021497#msg630214972. sam5tay ---> https://ninjastic.space/post/630836383.
